info.title: pc-persautopolicymod
info.description:
This API is used to initiate a transfer of automobile insurance coverage from one vehicle to another.  It is intended to provide process layer access (See [here](http://connections/issite/iCAF/SitePages/Home.aspx) for a description of this architecure) to a self service front end.  The API has been designed to be a framework which is reusable, allowing future personal automobile insurance transactions to be added.

#### Service Functionality
This service is built on top of the existing Exceed COM framework and the Enterprise Service Bus (ESB).  This framework is deployed on the Enterprise Service Bus (ESB); the framework provides a layer of abstraction which exposes the Exceed application via an external API.

Using the Exceed COM framework, this service orchestrates the necessary calls to the record-keeping system, wrapping the ACORD transactions as necessary.  This exposes the same functionality, to effect a change in the vehicle policy, as would be available to a Customer Service Representative via the exceed application.

![Vehicle Transfer](http://connections/issite/ews/SiteAssets/sd-pc-persautotransfer.png)

#### Known Implementations
_Vehicle Transfer_

#### Example XML
| Requests | Responses |
| --- | ---|
| [Free Form Vehicle Info](http://connections/issite/ews/SiteAssets/pc-persautotransfer/requests/Has_FreeformEnteredVehicleInfo.xml) | [Has Vehicle Questions Change](http://connections/issite/ews/SiteAssets/pc-persautotransfer/requests/Has_VehicleQuestionsChange_NO.xml) |
| [Has Vehicle Coverge Change](http://connections/issite/ews/SiteAssets/pc-persautotransfer/requests/Has_VehicleCoverageChange.xml) | |
| [Has Vehicle Interest Change](http://connections/issite/ews/SiteAssets/pc-persautotransfer/requests/Has_VehicleInterestsChange.xml) | |
| [Has Vehicle Questions Change NO](http://connections/issite/ews/SiteAssets/pc-persautotransfer/requests/Has_VehicleQuestionsChange_NO.xml) | |
| [Has Vehicle Questions Change YES](http://connections/issite/ews/SiteAssets/pc-persautotransfer/requests/Has_VehicleQuestionsChange_YES.xml) | |
